steps.title: Spatial Working Memory
steps.measurements: Your ability to remember the location of a target in space.
steps.yourObjective: Remember where dots are displayed in the space.
steps.instructions: Two or three black dots will be presented, then disappear. Try to remember the location of these dots. After a delay, you will be shown a red dot. Respond whether or not the red dot matches the location of any of the black dots.

learnMore.buttonTitle: See a video of someone doing this measurement.
